channel.title: [317][508][562]The T.U.Pk.S Series - Back Online! - The.Ultimate.Pking.Server
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]We Start at July 18th![/b][/size] [center]317 Bases: [hr] Hyperion/Deltascape (suggest which) Hybrid Pk's[hr] 508 Base: [hr] Z508 [hr] 562 Base: [hr] RS2HD [hr][/center] [font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b][img]http://The T.U.Pk.S Series - Back Online! - The.Ultimate.Pking.Server[/img][/b][/u][/size] [ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Our Aim[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donations]Donations[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]The Applying Layout[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#note]Note[/iurl][/li][/ul] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Hello, I am arham 4/Owner of WR (Ingame Name). I am here with you today, with the T.U.Pk.S series, back online!! Apply now or you'll be late! [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] T.U.Pk.S started from WorldRUINS, to Ulmata, to T.U.Pk.S. Though, T.U.Pk.S had an aim, as, WorldRUINS and Ulmata did not. To know our aim please go [iurl=#aim]here[/iurl]. I have looked through alot of servers, and saw one thing they didn't have, absolute fun. I have seen people quit after only 3 minutes of being on the server. What we will feature are Dungeoneering, Spawning, [b]ULTIMATE PKING[/b], and many more things. SOME people don't even think of these features. Ever had the ordinary, earn money or skill for money? Will we wont! ALMOST EVERYTHING WILL BE SPAWNABLE. We will have packages for donating, and if you order over a certain amount of pkp or money, you will get a free item included with it! [iurl=#aim]Well, let's move on![/iurl] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]3.0 - Our Aim[/b][/size] Our aim is to bring PKing to life! We will have monsters to drop the rarest of items, with a very high drop percent to drop them! More PKing fun with more domination power! We are going to add a place where you can change the prayer section to curses and add a quick prayer option! We will grant players 10 pkp for voting and voting will be allowed each 24 hours. Arham 4 - My IRL Friend:
T.U Pk.S will go far hopefully :).
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]4.0 - Donations[/b][/size] 70% our cash will be used to make the server better and 30% are going to my parents (They want it :p). [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]5.0 - The Applying Layout[/b][/size] Here is the layout: [code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Which do you think we should use?; Hyperion or Deltascape?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of T.U.Pk.S?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [/code] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size] Entertainers: zack/zack - xexe Dharma/Dharma - Dharma Coders: Kenazi/Kenazi - zxx75 Blessed/Blessed - I_Hybrid_I (Emergancy Coder) Baddy351/Baddy351 - Baddy351 David/David - bl00dpk Dharma/Dharma - Dharma Owner of WR/Owner of WR - Arham 4 Arham 4/Arham 4 - IRL Friend Suggestors: zake/zake - xexe Dharma/Dharma - Dharma Testers: zake/zake - xexe Blessed/Blessed - I_Hybrid_I Aetoc/Aetoc - Aetoc David/David - bl00dpk Dharma/Dharmda - Dharma Life/Life - hall Arham 4/Arham 4 - IRL Friend Owner of WR/Owner of WR - Arham 4 [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b]7.0 - Note[/b][/size] Arham 4 - IRL Friend:
"Who ever enters as staff will be set to administrator or moderator. You may even be a hidden. Any complaints HAS to be sent to my friend, Arham 4 - Moparscape account, further complaints will be asked to me, and I will have a quote like this for whatever I have said."
Arham 4 - IRL Friend:
"Anyone who enters as staff has to be loyal, follows directions, and can moderate the server. Also, all staff should have all the fun they can have!"

item.title: [317][508][562]The T.U.Pk.S Series - Back Online! - The.Ultimate.Pking.Server
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Here are what all the ranks do:

Coders: Code the server with me and other crew members.

Testers: Test the game and find bugs.

Suggestors: Can mail us at anytime if they have a suggestion.

Entertainers: Entertainers entertain people in the server to keep them playing.

This server has a long way to go, but we can do it. Sadly I had to switch computers so I lost my server files. I will remake them, so the server has been moved up till July 18th. Seems like I have a sleep-over at July 15th, so I hope to see you all on msn/teamviewer!

Thanks,
The T.U.Pk.S crew.

Everyones applications are accepted!!! Though, 1 has been declined: Tylarotheog. I am very sorry but you do not have enough experience. Hope you can forgive us :(. As for everyone else, congratulations!

We can through a party on the server that is soon to come :d,
Sincerely,
The T.U.Pk.S Team

Read full topic
